update demo_user set user_truename = #{userTruename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_nickname = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_mobile = #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_create_time = #{userCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user__last_login_time = #{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_url = #{userUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_external_id = #{userExternalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_modifydate = #{userModifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT hu.user_id, hu.user_truename, hu.user_nickname FROM demo_user AS hu WHERE hu.user_status = 1 AND (hu.user_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filterString,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR hu.user_truename LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filterString,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR hu.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filterString,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR hu.user_email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filterString,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR hu.user_mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filterString,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) LIMIT 10;
